targets.query: SELECT last("status") FROM "autogen"."nodemonitor" WHERE ("pubkey"::tag =~ /^$pubkey$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("leader_slot_count") 
FROM "autogen"."nodemonitor" 
WHERE ("pubkey"::tag =~ /^$pubkey$/) AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT produced, reward, slot, epoch
FROM blockmetrics
WHERE ("pubkey"::tag =~ /^$pubkey$/)
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 80

SELECT 
  epoch, 
  jito_mev_rewards_sol, 
  jito_mev_rewards_lamports,
  jito_operator_rewards_sol,
  jito_mev_commission_bps
FROM jito_mev_epochs 
WHERE ("pubkey"::tag =~ /^$pubkey$/)
ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT SUM("reward")
FROM "blockmetrics"
WHERE ("pubkey"::tag =~ /^$pubkey$/)
  AND "epoch" != '823'
GROUP BY "epoch"

SELECT MEAN("validatorCreditsCurrent") / MEAN("validatorCreditsCurrent") AS present
FROM "autogen"."nodemonitor"
WHERE "pubkey" =~ /^$pubkey$/ AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nodemonitor WITH KEY="host"
list.label: Server
list.name: server

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nodemonitor WITH KEY="host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/
list.label: Network Interface
list.name: netif

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/
list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/
